Sentencas: Optimal control can ensure system safe operation with a high efficiency.
Titulo: Optimal robust control strategy of a solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: However, only a few papers discuss optimal control strategies for solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) systems.
Titulo: Optimal robust control strategy of a solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: Moreover, the existed methods ignore the impact of parameter uncertainty on system instantaneous performance.
Titulo: Optimal robust control strategy of a solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: In real SOFC systems, several parameters may vary with the variation of operation conditions and can not be identified exactly, such as load current.
Titulo: Optimal robust control strategy of a solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: Therefore, a robust optimal control strategy is proposed, which involves three parts: a SOFC model with parameter uncertainty, a robust optimizer and robust controllers.
Titulo: Optimal robust control strategy of a solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: During the model building process, boundaries of the uncertain parameter are extracted based on Monte Carlo algorithm.
Titulo: Optimal robust control strategy of a solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: To achieve the maximum efficiency, a two-space particle swarm optimization approach is employed to obtain optimal operating points, which are used as the set points of the controllers.
Titulo: Optimal robust control strategy of a solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: To ensure the SOFC safe operation, two feed-forward controllers and a higher order robust sliding mode controller are presented to control fuel utilization ratio, air excess ratio and stack temperature afterwards.
Titulo: Optimal robust control strategy of a solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: The results show the proposed optimal robust control method can maintain the SOFC system safe operation with a maximum efficiency under load and uncertainty variations.
Titulo: Optimal robust control strategy of a solid oxide fuel cell system
